channel.title: NRS3server 742
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2cijon7.png[/img]
Recently I got a lot of messages from previous players, friends, and my old development team, deciding to start up NRS3server again. I have decided to make nrs3server again with the help of some new developers as well so that we can make NRS3server even better than it was before. This is still a work in progress, but hopefully in time we will have a decent server running.
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/xf9un6.jpg[/img]
-742 Maps -Weapon Sheathing -10 Quests (interfaces shows progress [not started/inprogress/completed]) -Grand Exchange (disabled until we reach a desired number of players) -All 24 Skills -Player Houses -Better teleport system -Account Recovery system -Cutscene tutorial custom made
[size=18pt]MINIGAMES[/size] -Fist of Guthix -Stealing Creation -Pest Control -Troll Invasion The usual minigames as well.
[size=18pt]CLANS[/size] editting clan colors vexillium clan cloak Clan Banks
[size=18pt]BOSSES[/size] Vorago Leeuni Sunfreet Yk'Lagor The Thunderous And the usual other bosses
[spoiler=Media] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mDr3EHc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Idk1VA8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9xM79vw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/awPClHd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jIli6XX.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/of88ErJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QQWKaCs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8KXhkBq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ygNe8DJ.png[/img][/spoiler]
Ill post more Features, and pictures as our development progresses. We are currently Looking for GFX artists to help with our forums art.[/center]

item.title: NRS3server 742
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

[center]

2cijon7.png900×234

Recently I got a lot of messages from previous players, friends, and my old development team, deciding to start up NRS3server again. I have decided to make nrs3server again with the help of some new developers as well so that we can make NRS3server even better than it was before. This is still a work in progress, but hopefully in time we will have a decent server running.

-742 Maps
-Weapon Sheathing
-10 Quests (interfaces shows progress [not started/inprogress/completed])
-Grand Exchange (disabled until we reach a desired number of players)
-All 24 Skills
-Player Houses
-Better teleport system
-Account Recovery system
-Cutscene tutorial custom made

[size=18pt]MINIGAMES[/size]
-Fist of Guthix
-Stealing Creation
-Pest Control
-Troll Invasion
The usual minigames as well.

[size=18pt]CLANS[/size]
editting clan colors
vexillium
clan cloak
Clan Banks

[size=18pt]BOSSES[/size]
Vorago
Leeuni
Sunfreet
Yk’Lagor The Thunderous
And the usual other bosses

[spoiler=Media]








ygNe8DJ.png743×341
[/spoiler]

Ill post more Features, and pictures as our development progresses.
We are currently Looking for GFX artists to help with our forums art.[/center]
